7. 平伏茎（procumbent）(Procumbent)：茎平行接触地表，枝端向上直立，但茎节未着生不定根者。 8. 匍枝茎(Stoloniferous)：产生走茎，枝端生根 …

list.abs: shrubs procumbent , to 1 m , rarely small trees ; seed-cone-bearing branchlets apically curved .平卧的灌木，在1米，很少小乔木；忍受球果的小枝顶部弯曲。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin procumbent- 'falling forwards', from the verb procumbere, from pro- 'forwards, down' + a verb related to cubare 'to lie'

means.word_mean: 1. having stems that trail along the ground without putting down roots
